summary: This Mod changes weight (1/3 of original weight, but max 1) and prices (2x-3x the original price) of thinks that can be hunted.
descriptionHtml:
[B][SIZE=5]Jaegermeister 1.01

Update: Sorry @ all downloaders. I\'ve ziped german files with english 1.0 version. Please download again 1.01 version - this should working.
[/SIZE][/B]

[IMG]http://static.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/images/3238-1-1323536806.png[/IMG]
 
The state is alpha, because i do not have an english Skyrim to test. Please write a comment at Nexus if it is working or not. 
 
[B]Hello @ all,[/B]
 
first of all please excuse my really bad english. My original Mod is in german, but i use the
\"Skyrim String Localizer\" to make an english version.
 
This Mod changes weight (1/3 of original weight, but max 1) and prices (2x-3x the original price) of thinks that can be hunted.

[B]Here is a list witch things were re-balanced:[/B]
[LIST]
[*]Bear Pelt
[*]Cave Bear Pelt
[*]Snow Bear Pelt
[*]Horker Tusk
[*]Mammoth Tusk
[*]Sabre Cat Pelt
[*]Sabre Cat Snow Pelt
[*]Wolf Pelt
[*]Ice Wolf Pelt
[*]Goat Hide
[*]Cow Hide
[*]Deer Hide
[*]Horse Hide
[*]Leather Strips
[*]Deer Pelt
[*]Fox Pelt
[*]Snow Fox Pelt
[*]Leather
[*]Werewolf Pelt
[*]Bear Claws
[*]Eye of Sabre Cat
[*]Sabre Cat Tooth[/LIST]


[B][SIZE=3]Install:[/SIZE][/B]
[LIST][*]copy whole \"[B][I]Data[/I][/B]\"-folder in your Skyrim-folder,
[*]anwer overwrite-question of windows with \"[B][I]yes[/I][/B]\",
[*]start Skyrim Launcher,
[*]select [B][I]Data Files[/I][/B],
[*]be sure there is a check before \"[B][I]Jaegermeister.esp[/I][/B]\",
[*]finish, start Skyrim.[/LIST]


[B][SIZE=3]Deinstall:[/SIZE][/B]
[LIST][*]delete \"[B][I]Jaegermeister.esp[/I][/B]\" from \"[B][I]DATA[/I][/B]\"-folder,
[*]in folder \"[B][I]Strings[/I][/B]\" delete following files:
[*]\"[B][I]Jaegermeister - english_English.STRINGS[/I][/B]\",
[*]\"[B][I]Jaegermeister - english_English.ILSTRINGS[/I][/B]\", 
[*]\"[B][I]Jaegermeister - english_English.DLSTRINGS[/I][/B]\".
[*]if now the folder \"[B][I]Strings[/I][/B]\" is empty you can delete ist too.
[/LIST]
This mod is made with [I][B]FO3-Archive Utility, TESsnip [/B](part of [B]Fomm[/B])[B], FNVEdit[/B][/I] and [B][I]Skyrim String Localizer[/I][/B]. 
Thanks at the autors of this programs. Without them it would not be possible for me doing this mod. 

If you like this mode, please vote for me at Nexus.

[B][SIZE=5]Have a great time in Skyrim![/SIZE][/B]

[I][SIZE=1]Last Update: 18.12.2011[/SIZE][/I]

[B][SIZE=4]Black Widowmaker - Software Unlimited[/SIZE][/B]
author: Black Widowmaker
